body:
Comment 12: 
http://code.google.com/p/go-wiki/wiki/WindowsDLLs
I thought I would try it instead of cgo for opengl, because of that wiki page.

OpenGL 4.4 Core using syscall.SyscallX()
https://github.com/bryanturley/gl/blob/master/core/funcs_windows.go
generated from the official gl.xml file I didn't type all that, heh.

It is working so far in windows on amd64 with those 4 movs.
